title: Getting Started Everything You Need to Know - Hydroponics
description:
463 pages                                                                      This is one of the most comprehensive guides to the art of hydroponics. This a very large ebook  The ebook is is in pdf format.
Topic Includes:

General Hydroponics

Windowsill Wonder

Controller Instructions

Powergrower Setup Instructions 
Eve's Garden Setup Instructions 
Planning and Building a Greenhouse 
Indoor Lighting

Hydroponic Pumps

Super Nutrients

pH Acidbase
